column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4828_469f440924f120f34c6e065d236e8ca230456445/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
Can you also add a comment to explain why the -1 is there to begin with?\n
@TheBlueMatt I used to understand why the -1 was there long ago, but I've lost the memory of why it was needed now...  I'd have to relook at the code from years ago to work it out.\n
Closing in favor of #4831 which does away with this voodoo.\n
